experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: 𝗗𝘆𝗻𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗰 𝗧𝗮𝗿𝗴𝗲𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗣𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗳𝗼𝗹𝗶𝗼 𝗢𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘇𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻• Developed and deployed an algorithm that dynamically recommends which physicians to target based on their behavior, maximizing overall sales and contributing to a 20% increase in the drug sales growth rate.• Implemented a mixed data sourcing strategy and built multiple predictive and reactive triggers to capture brand-wise opportunities at the HCP level, enhancing prediction confidence and maintaining comprehensive coverage.• Led cross-functional teams across time zones, ensuring clear communication and timely delivery of outputs.𝗗𝗼𝗰𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗹.𝗔𝗜 - 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁 𝗗𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹𝗼𝗽𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁• Created HCP-level embeddings for multiple markets, compressing 2k sparse features into low-dimensional dense representations to enhance data efficiency and improve model performance by 10% compared to traditional methods.• Utilized these embeddings to develop multiple business opportunities across therapeutic areas, for emerging pharma.• Developed an innovative method to enhance model interpretability and build stakeholder trust by calculating SHAP values for original features, providing clear explanations alongside HCP predictions for a therapy area in given market.𝗥𝗲𝗱𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗼𝗿 𝗕𝗼𝘁• Developed an advanced document redaction bot for clinical trial PDFs using generative AI and state-of-the-art LLMs, implementing a human-in-the-loop system to automate personal information redaction across diverse document types.• Achieved 96% recall rate in sensitive information detection while reducing processing time from weeks to hours and cutting per-document redaction costs by over 90% across multiple document formats.• Designed and solely executed the end-to-end redaction bot project, from initial conception through comprehensive user acceptance testing, demonstrating full-cycle product development capabilities.
